tool_description: Updates and monitors ticket status throughout the support lifecycle with timestamp tracking and audit trail.

new_status.description: New status to set (new, open, pending, resolved, closed)

agent_id.description: ID of agent making the status change

customer_notified.description: Whether customer should be notified of status change

error_messages: Ticket not found: The provided ticket_id does not exist.
Invalid status: Use one of [new, open, pending, resolved, closed].
Invalid status transition: Cannot change from current status to requested status.
Agent not found: The provided agent_id does not exist.
Permission denied: Agent does not have permission to change ticket status.
usage: Update ticket status with proper validation and audit trail. Optionally notify customer of status changes.
